description.message: Using the ChatGPTalk sidebar extension allows you to easily summarize the text of web pages using ChatGPT.

default_prompt1_value.message:
Summarize the provided text into concise bullet points. Include one fitting emoji per point to enhance readability. Respond in English. Here is the content:
{{CONTENT}}

default_prompt2_value.message: Please translate the following text into English: {{CONTENT}}

default_prompt3_value.message:
Format the transcript below in English to make it easy to read. Use emojis and other enhancements for better readability:
{{CONTENT}}

default_prompt4_value.message:
Extract the main content from the following HTML and convert it into well-structured Markdown format. Please respond in English:
{{HTML}}

default_prompt5_value.message: Please proofread the above text to ensure it is clear and easy to understand for first-time readers. Clearly explain what the content is about. If any information seems missing, include annotations suggesting where additional details should be added. Please respond in English.

sidepanel_maxCharstoSplit.message: Maximum number of characters to split the string

options_maxCharsToSplit.message: Maximum number of characters to split a string into
